title: cannot download patch, open launcher and get RADS ERROR and pvp.net kernel error
body: so i posted a few days ago and have tried pretty much every "solution" everyone has posted. i cannot download the launcher client from the site. i also cannot access a lot of the links in the forums. i cannot access the game past the league of legends pop up before the patcher it either says pvp.net kernel not responding and if it gets past the black box it says RADS error cannot connect to the server i have uninstalled and reinstalled  i basically cannot access anything other then this website and the forums. but so far reaching out for help has not got me a reply or solution.

replies.body: ive had the error for days now. ive also tried many solutions. i hope something gets done soon ~.~
